column3:
I was there when your life began
Drew the lines in the palm of your hand
Heard you cry, did you think I'd let you go?
I was there when you took a step
Held your mom as she held her breath
Walked with you when you thought you were alone
I was there, did you think I'd let you go?

[Pre-Chorus]
When the steady ground crumbles
I'll be the place where you stand
When you're heartbroken
I will be strong whеn you can't
I'm here when you'rе ready
To trust me again
Let go of your life and
Find you have always been
[Chorus]
In good hands (In good hands)
In good hands (In good hands)
In good hands

[Verse 2]
I was there when the walls collapsed
Stayed with you 'til the storm had passed
Heard your prayer, did you think I'd ever leave?
I was there in the darkest night
Crawled with you into morning light
Gave you strength when your weary soul was weak
I was there, did you think I'd ever leave?
When the steady ground crumbles
I'll be the place where you stand
When you're heartbroken
I will be strong when you can't
I'm here when you're ready
To trust me again
Let go of your life and
Find you have always been

[Chorus]
In good hands (In good hands)
In good hands (In good hands)
In good hands

Ooh, I've got you, I've got you

You don't gotta worry at all

You don't gotta worry at all
You don't gotta worry in good hands
Ooh, I've got you, I've got you
I've got you, I've got you
You don't gotta worry at all
You don't gotta worry in good hands
Oh, I will sing it forever if I have to
You don't gotta worry at all
You don't gotta worry in good hands

[Pre-Chorus]
When the steady ground crumbles
I'll be the place where you stand
When you're heartbroken
I will be strong when you can't
I'm here when you're ready
To trust me again
Let go of your life and
Find you have always been
[Chorus]
In good hands (In good hands)
In good hands (In good hands)
In good hands

[Outro]
Find healing in rescue
In the arms of a friend
Let go of your life and
Find you have always been in good handsEmbed
